message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I think we can both do better. 60-40 for me is fair, considering the inflation factor.
Considering the inflation, my share should increase. This is my new proposal.
I'm willing to give up a little more to avoid further inflation. 55-45 is my final offer.
You said 55-45 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Inflation is on my side.
